name: Service Provider Configuration
description:
Schema for representing the service provider's
      configuration

attributes.name: documentationUri
attributes.description:
An HTTP addressable URL pointing to the service
          provider's human consumable help documentation.

attributes.name: patch
attributes.description:
A complex type that specifies PATCH
          configuration options.

subAttributes.name: supported
subAttributes.description:
Boolean value specifying whether the
              operation is supported.

attributes.name: bulk
attributes.description:
A complex type that specifies BULK
          configuration options.

subAttributes.name: supported
subAttributes.description:
Boolean value specifying whether the
              operation is supported.

subAttributes.name: maxOperations
subAttributes.description:
An integer value specifying the maximum
              number of operations.

subAttributes.name: maxPayloadSize
subAttributes.description:
An integer value specifying the maximum
              payload size in bytes.

attributes.name: filter
attributes.description: A complex type that specifies FILTER options.

subAttributes.name: supported
subAttributes.description:
Boolean value specifying whether the
              operation is supported.

subAttributes.name: maxResults
subAttributes.description:
Integer value specifying the maximum number
              of resources returned in a response.

attributes.name: changePassword
attributes.description:
A complex type that specifies change password
          options.

subAttributes.name: supported
subAttributes.description:
Boolean value specifying whether the
              operation is supported.

attributes.name: sort
attributes.description:
A complex type that specifies sort result
          options.

subAttributes.name: supported
subAttributes.description:
Boolean value specifying whether the
              operation is supported.

name: ResourceType
description:
Specifies the schema that describes a SCIM Resource
       Type

attributes.name: id
attributes.description:
The resource type's server unique id. May be
          the same as the 'name' attribute.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description:
The resource type name. When applicable service
          providers MUST specify the name specified in the core schema
          specification; e.g., User

attributes.name: description
attributes.description:
The resource type's human readable description.
          When applicable service providers MUST specify the description



Hunt, et al.            Expires October 26, 2015               [Page 67]

 
Internet-Draft           draft-scim-core-schema               April 2015


          specified in the core schema specification.

attributes.name: endpoint
attributes.description:
The resource type's HTTP addressable endpoint
          relative to the Base URL; e.g., /Users

attributes.name: schema
attributes.description: The resource types primary/base schema URI

attributes.name: schemaExtensions
attributes.description:
A list of URIs of the resource type's schema
          extensions

subAttributes.name: schema
subAttributes.description: The URI of a schema extension.

subAttributes.name: required
subAttributes.description:
A Boolean value that specifies whether the
              schema extension is required for the resource type. If
              true, a resource of this type MUST include this schema
              extension and include any attributes declared as required
              in this schema extension. If false, a resource of this
              type MAY omit this schema extension.

name: Schema
description: Specifies the schema that describes a SCIM Schema

attributes.name: id
attributes.description:
The unique URI of the schema. When applicable
          service providers MUST specify the URI specified in the core
          schema specification

attributes.name: name
attributes.description:
The schema's human readable name. When
          applicable service providers MUST specify the name specified

attributes.description:

          in the core schema specification; e.g., User

attributes.name: attributes
attributes.description:
A complex attribute that includes the
          attributes of a schema

subAttributes.name: name
subAttributes.description: The attribute's name

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description:
The attribute's data type. Valid values
              include: 'string', 'complex', 'boolean', 'decimal',
              'integer', 'dateTime', 'reference'.

subAttributes.name: multiValued
subAttributes.description:
Boolean indicating an attribute's
              plurality.

subAttributes.name: description
subAttributes.description:
A human readable description of the
              attribute.

subAttributes.name: required
subAttributes.description:
A boolean indicating if the attribute
              is required.

subAttributes.name: canonicalValues
subAttributes.description:
A collection of canonical values.  When
              applicable service providers MUST specify the canonical
              types specified in the core schema specification; e.g.,
              'work', 'home'.

subAttributes.name: caseExact
subAttributes.description:
Indicates if a string attribute is
              case-sensitive.

subAttributes.name: mutability
subAttributes.description: Indicates if an attribute is modifiable.

subAttributes.name: returned
subAttributes.description:
Indicates when an attribute is returned in
              a response (e.g., to a query).

subAttributes.name: uniqueness
subAttributes.description: Indicates how unique a value must be.

subAttributes.name: referenceTypes
subAttributes.description:
Used only with an attribute of type
              'reference'. Specifies a SCIM resourceType that a
              reference attribute MAY refer to. e.g., User
